name: Educulas
short_description:
Educulas is one of the most innovative campus management system to turn your institution digital. Built on open source technologies, with clear focus on information architecture and user friendly interface, Educulas strives to remain as the best campus management software on the planet.

Specification and Mobility

Educulas is built on open source technologies. It runs on the most recent web development IDEs and software packages. The Application has been built keeping in mind the global requirements of various campuses. An ambitious app for the Educulas application is currently in its development stage. Built for the ever growing andriod system, it comprises all the key features required to go mobile.

Actuality

Educulas is a product of the technology driven folks over at Actuality, who enjoying creation of Internet based design, technology and media products.
summary: Turning your campus digital with all the love in the world
